typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Date as string,
		Rate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	multiLineRow: true,
	wildcardPaths:[('20*.csv')]) ~> source2402
source2402 derive(NewDate = toString(currentTimestamp(), 'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(deleteIf(Date=='1/2/2000')) ~> AlterRow1
source2402 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'newcontainer',
	truncate: false,
	mergeSchema: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2402
